summary: In the African Jungle, a group of Europeans come across the fabled white man who was raised by apes. Tarzan takes an immediate liking to the blond Mary Brooks and rescues her during a nasty... See full summary »
cast: Buster Crabbe|Julie Bishop|Edward Woods|Philo McCullough|E. Alyn Warren|Mischa Auer|Matthew Betz|Frank Lackteen|Symona Boniface|Everett Brown|George DeNormand|Darby Jones|Al Kikume|Jack Leonard|Carlotta Monti|Philip Sleeman|Ivory Williams
director: Director: Robert F. Hill (as Robert Hill)
title: Tarzán de las fieras
